item.title: Cafes in Central London
item.description: I love working and reading in a cafe, people chatting in the background makes me easy to focus on the tasks at hand.

item.title: Living in London
item.description: London is the greatest circus [[Cafes in Central London]] [[Restaurants in London]] “Why, Sir, you find no man, at all intellectual, who is willing to leave London.

item.title: Restaurants in London
